creator: hanasaki@hanaden.com
text:
1. no link to subant from the core tasks list in the left side frame
2. docs are sparse

creator: levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de
text:
I have added index entries for subant in docs/manual/coretasklist.html and 
docs/manual/tasksoverview.html. They will be in the next nightly build.

creator: levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de
text:
Dominique, can you provide examples of subant for the documentation.
Thanks in advance. Antoine

creator: levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de
text:
I have updated the manual page in CVS with an example.
Please have a look and let us know about your suggestions.

creator: levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de
text:
I got no feedback on this bug report, so I am closing it. Hopefully the 
documentation is OK now ?
